column4: Hey people! I just installed Ubuntu today and are a complete noob at it, but i wanna use some form of Windows Emulator, but it ways that WINE can't be installed on my system. Got any alternatives?
why can'T wine be installed on your system ?
check www.winehq.org  ,  in the get wine section,  in the ubuntu section,  there is a links about 3/4 way down with instructions on how to instal on a 64 bit syst
donT' thank me yet, I have no idea if it works
